code: export var setPlaylist=function setPlaylist(playlist){return{type:"SET_PLAYLIST",payload:playlist};};export var setCurrentPlaying=function setCurrentPlaying(curr_music){return{type:"SET_CURR_PLAYING",payload:curr_music};};export var setBannerOpen=function setBannerOpen(isOpen){return{type:"SET_BANNER_OPEN",payload:isOpen};};export var increaseTimesPlayed=function increaseTimesPlayed(id){return{type:"INC_TIMES_PLAYED",payload:id};};export var setSearch=function setSearch(searchQuery){return{type:"SET_SEARCH_QUERY",payload:searchQuery};};export var setMusicLang=function setMusicLang(langList){return{type:"SET_MUSIC_LIST",payload:langList};};
